title: Crowd Cloud Crowded
info: Exploring Generative AI in the Context of Data Cities
description: Through the interdisciplinary collaboration of Yu-Hsuan Chiu and Yu-Lin Tsai, 'CROWD / CLOUD / CROWDED' presents a generative AI response within the context of data cities. Leveraging social media data, the project showcases emotion generation and interactive interfaces, delving into reflections on the standardization of individual consciousness. It observes the interaction between AI and social media.
